name: Roboter
overview: A mech strategy wargame for one to 6 users released to public domain in 1990. Robot simulates a fight between heavy robots up to 18 meters high. Each player can choose 1-6 robots with different characteristics. You can choose: FISTHAWK can kick and punch in all directions and negates mines. YETI feels most comfortable in the mountains, THUNDERWEEL shouldn't get too close to the water. ANTIMEYER is immune to MOVEKILLER and BIG TOASTER. HOBBIT is immune to mine explosions unless he's into it. Menu controls: Player1 cursor left, cursor right, spacebar Player2 joystick left, right, fire button press mouse button.
